title: Stuffed Tomatoes with Grits and Ricotta

instructions.1: In a small pot combine dry grits, 1 1/2 cups water, and 3/4 teaspoon of salt. Bring to a boil, then simmer until grits are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Cool.
instructions.2: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray.
instructions.3: Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then stir in the cooled grits, ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and Asiago cheese. Stir in the garlic powder, parsley, crushed red pepper, and 1 teaspoon salt. Mix well.
instructions.4: Slice the top off of each tomato. Use a spoon to hollow out the tomatoes, leaving the outer shells (approximately 1/4 inch thick) intact. Fill each with the grits mixture. Arrange stuffed tomatoes on prepared baking sheet.
instructions.5: Bake in preheated oven until light golden brown, 30 to 40 minutes. Allow to cool slightly before serving.
